name: Devderby-jan-2013
tagline: My entry to the Mozilla Devderby for Drag and Drop in January 2013
body:
# Classical Music Jukebox
My entry to the Mozilla Devderby for January 2013

[
![Music Jukebox](https://developer.cdn.mozilla.net/media/uploads/demos/j/v/jvitela/8ca8f4c2857132f3bbd88077cec96a41/1359577501_screenshot_1.png)
](https://developer.mozilla.org/es/demos/detail/classical-music-jukebox/launch)
This application is a music jukebox containing classical music records,
you can listen to compositions of famous composers like Beethoven, Vivaldi, Mozart and Chopin.

Developed using Twitter Bootstrap for layout and styling,
Backbone, Underscore and Mustache for Javascript interactions.
Audio link sources are from the Wikipedia.

Audio works only for browsers supporting OGG audio format and the audio tag

**Build to work with the native Drag and Drop API from HTML5**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
